name: ForgivenessPrayer
0:
”Alexa, open Forgiveness Prayer”
”Alexa, open Forgiveness Prayer and forgive others”
”Alexa, open Forgiveness Prayer and forgive myself”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: forgiveness prayer
des: This skill is used to forgive oneself and others. You can neutralize your negative karma and get a peaceful and happy life by doing Forgiveness Prayer regularly.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
